snippet: President Obama has the opportunity to reshape the post-cold-war world to make it fundamentally safer by reducing nuclear arsenals. He needs to seize it.
abstract: Editorial urges Pres Obama to take the lead in making deep cuts in America's nuclear arsenal; submits that the once-in-a-decade study of the arsenal and nuclear war plans offers the opportunity to reshape the post-cold-war world to make it fundamentally safer.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has the opportunity to reshape the post-cold-war world to make it fundamentally safer by reducing nuclear arsenals. He needs to seize it.
